generator.group: Harry Perkins Institute of Medical Research

contact.group: Harry Perkins Institute of Medical Research

publications.title: Generation of two iPSC lines from patients with inherited central core disease and concurrent malignant hyperthermia caused by dominant missense variants in the RYR1 gene

donor.disease_description: Inherited central core disease and concurrent malignant hyperthermia caused by dominant missense variants in the RYR1 gene
donor.disease_name: Central core disease of muscle; Malignant hyperthermia susceptibility 1

genomic_modifications.description: missense variants in the RYR1 gene

genomic_characterisation.summary: The cell lines are confirmed to be free of mycoplasma and Epstein-Barr virus, with normal karyotype and confirmed identity by STR analysis.
